text: Soni kwa jwalijose (mwa jenumanja) tutomeche nkuntawalila (jwakwe) pa chipanje chalesile achinangolo wawili ni waulongo, sano awala wamwatawene nao chilanga (chakuntawalila chipanje chenu), mwapani liunjili lyao (kupitila mu wasiya wachimwalechele), chisimu Allah pa chindu chilichose awele Jwakutendela umboni
